name: Clockwork Oaken Bolter
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork makes two Lancing Bolt attacks or one Lancing Bolt attack and one Harpoon attack.

actions.name: Lancing Bolt
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the clockwork. A creature takes 5 (1d10 damage) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The clockwork can grapple only one creature at a time with its harpoon.

actions.name: Explosive Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: The clockwork launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
